title: #288 - Frankenstein, Philosophy, and Romanticism
itunes:title: #288 - Frankenstein, Philosophy, and Romanticism
description: Clanking chains! Creaking doors! Rattling bones! Those sounds can only mean one thing. It's time for the annual Halloween-adjacent philosophy discussion here on Drunken Philosophy. This year, Connor and Dan quit beating around the bush and just talk about their old pal Franky-stein. If you've never read the book, don't worry. Neither has Dan.

This year, Connor and Dan quit beating around the bush and just talk about their old pal Franky-stein. If you've never read the book, don't worry. Neither has Dan.
